scripts.setup: npm install && npm --prefix src/extension install && npm --prefix src/plugin install && npm run build
scripts.dev: npm run dev:extension & npm run dev:plugin
scripts.build: npm run build:extension && npm run build:plugin
scripts.build:extension: npm --prefix src/extension install --no-audit --no-fund && npm --prefix src/extension run build
scripts.build:plugin: npm --prefix src/plugin install --no-audit --no-fund && npm --prefix src/plugin run build
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run test
